metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13741 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Blink in Google Chrome priorto 79.0.3945.79 allowed a local attacker to bypass same origin policy viacrafted clipboard content.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13741` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 79.0.3945.79-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 79.0.3945.79-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 79.0.3945.79-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 79.0.3945.79-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 79.0.3945.79-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '79.0.3945.79-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
